mapper.select: select cmcId, targetName, targetValue, collectTime from perfcmcservicequalitylast where cmcId = #{cmcId}
select cmcId, channelIndex, targetName, targetValue, collectTime from perfcmcsignalqualitylast where targetName = #{targetName} and cmcId = #{cmcId}
select cmcId, channelIndex, targetName, targetValue, collectTime from perfcmcsignalqualitylast where targetName = #{targetName} and cmcId = #{cmcId} and channelIndex = #{channelIndex}

select cmcId, channelIndex ifIndex, channelInOctets ifInOctets, channelOutOctets ifOutOctets, channelOctets ifOctets, channelInSpeed ifInSpeed, channelOutSpeed ifOutSpeed, channelUtilization ifUtilization, collectTime from perfcmcflowqualitylast where cmcId = #{cmcId}

select cmcId, channelIndex ifIndex, channelInOctets ifInOctets, channelOutOctets ifOutOctets, channelOctets ifOctets, channelInSpeed ifInSpeed, channelOutSpeed ifOutSpeed, channelUtilization ifUtilization, collectTime from perfcmcflowqualitylast where cmcId = #{cmcId} and channelIndex = #{channelIndex}

select cmcId, channelIndex, max(channelUtilization) max, min(channelUtilization) min, avg(channelUtilization) avg from perfcmcflowquality where cmcId = #{cmcId} and channelIndex = #{channelIndex} and collectTime BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}

select cmcId, channelIndex, max(targetValue) max, min(targetValue) min, avg(targetValue) avg from perfcmcsignalquality where cmcId = #{cmcId} and channelIndex = #{channelIndex} and targetName=#{targetName} and collectTime BETWEEN #{startTime} and #{endTime}
